item.description:
New - Local Pub Crawls!
sponsored by: Dollar Mouse!

Free Food & Drink*!

No need to buy food (or non-alcoholic drinks) as this is all included in the pub crawl!

Get $20 worth of appetizers and drinks* during the pub crawl which saves us lots of time ($10 to cover these costs!) - Tips are optional to wait staff at day of event and a suggestion is $1 tip to wait staff per-person, per-'stop' along the way which is usually between 3 - 5 stops with appetizers.)

Be part of a really fun group for up to four hours.

Schedule:

We meet at The Tap for their deliciously fresh house-brewed beer and free appetizers and then move along the 'route' for more fun until we end up at the Peddler's Daughter (an authentic Irish Pub)!

Come, explore this lovely city and the beautiful and historic restaurants and pubs downtown! Experience some memorable pubs, rustic/cool restaurants and meet new people!

Go to DollarMouse.com to sign up for one (or all) of these pub crawls.
* (non-alcoholic drinks)
item.name: Pub Crawl - Sponsored by Dollar Mouse! [HAVERHILL]
